utterance.nlg: What is the name of the franchise hotel?
utterance.kb: This is a brand new franchise hotel targeted towards business travellers with a very interesting interior design that may suggest other usage too. Similar to the 268 or Hanting chain but a bit more upscale. It has some interesting features like an iPod loudspeaker player and automatic curtains but not all features are self explanatory, so I stood a while in the dark room until I figured out the lights work how (tip: there is no slot for the keycard to activate the room electrics, just lay it in the pigeon hole in the wall). The location is rather central but difficult to find, it is directly beside a school (#441), while the hotel has street number #417 and the sign for the hotel name on an arch very high above the entrance so easily to be missed. the hotel is not directly at the street one needs to enter a side street. Subway stop Line 7 Changping road about a 10 minutes walk but you should know your way around. There is WIFI but you are limited to one device per room (this is not apparent but if you log in another device the first one gets without notice cut off), also iOS devices (Iphone, iPad) are not always able to connect, the trick is to go on the hotel website then the login page may open or not. Room for improvement. Curtains open and close by tugging them more or less forcefully.
